modeAuto.message: Auto-Detect - automatically detect the proxy settings for your network

modeAutoMSG.message: Automatically detect the proxy settings for your network

modeDirect.message: No Proxy - directly connected to network which bypasses system proxy

modeDirectMSG.message: Directly connect to network and bypass system proxy

modeFixed.message: Manual Proxy - proxy server for each scheme (HTTP, HTTPS, and FTP) is defined in the settings page

modeFixedMSG.message: Define proxy server for each protocol

modePACMSG.message: Proxy is determined from a PAC script
